alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 6:53PM EDT until August 19 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR WESTERN SEMINOLE AND WESTERN ORANGE COUNTIES... At 651 PM EDT, a band of strong to severe thunderstorms extended from near Sanford to Orlando, moving slowly northeast at 10 mph. A wind gust to 55 mph was reported at the Orlando International Airport and a gust to 45 mph occurred at the Orlando Executive Airport. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Sanford, Altamonte Springs and Oviedo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
